name: space shooter creator
description:
create your own space shooter from scratch

in this game follow F.A.D.E as he helps u put together your own space shooter

customize values of the player and the enemies

controls

mouse to drag and drop  

or mouse left click

space /enter to go to the next thing F.A.D.E has to say 

in space shooter

WASD to move

moving the mouse will rotate the player ship

pause by pressing p or escape 

left click to fire

bullets, space ships, and barrels are from an art pack created by  BizmasterStudios

the rests are all mine or Godot
